items.title: Jim Cramer on McDonald’s (MCD): “It’s Viewed as Safety”
items.description: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Discusses These 10 Stocks & Says US Faces Unfairly High Tariffs Abroad. In this article, we are going to take a look at where McDonald’s Corporation (NYSE:MCD) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discusses. In a recent appearance on CNBC’s Squawk on the Street, Jim Cramer […]
